kiosk.description: Hides the settings button from drawer.

integerMonetary.description: Indicates if the monetary input should accept decimals or not

priceVerification.description: Displays price verification button in PLU, only for countries that do not require a control transaction for that.

clearReceiptTimeout.description: The number of seconds the receipt is visible after finalization. In milliseconds.

ServerSettingsType.description: This is a definition of the server settings

networkCallTimeout.description: The timeout for network calls. In milliseconds.

LayoutSettingsType.description: This is a definition of the layout properties settings.

logoUri.description: URI for logo in SCO mode.

enableInfoReceipt.description: Enables the new receipt rendering based on the info property data.

theme.description: Theme object for customisation of the app.

ScoSettingsType.description: This is a definition of the SCO properties settings.

pluFlag.description: Enables the plu in SCO mode.

callAssistantFlag.description: Enables the call assistant button in SCO mode.

bagsScreenFlag.description: Enables the bags screen in SCO mode.

disableDecreaseFlag.description: Allows for item's quantity decrease in SCO mode.

availableLanguages.description: Defines the available languages in SCO mode. Comma separated i.e en-GB,sv-SE

defaultLanguage.description: Defines the default languages in SCO mode.

sessionKeepAliveInterval.description: Defines the session keep alive interval in SCO mode. To be set in milliseconds.

scoLoyaltyCCPrefix.description: Defines the loyalty card prefix in SCO mode.
